meanings.definition: The essence or unique characteristic of a particular thing.
meanings.sent1: The haecceity of the painting was its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the haecceity of each species in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The haecceity of the clown's outfit made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her haecceity shone through in her exceptional talent for music.
meanings.sent5: The haecceity of the diamond was its flawless clarity.

meanings.definition: The quality of being a particular individual or unique entity.
meanings.sent1: The haecceity of the old house was its historical significance.
meanings.sent2: Each snowflake has its own haecceity, just like every person.
meanings.sent3: The haecceity of the cat's meow always made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His haecceity as a leader inspired others to follow him.
meanings.sent5: The haecceity of the antique vase made it a valuable collectible.
